mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO wfRiven (id, url_name, en , zh, r_group,attributes) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.urlName}, #{item.enName}, #{item.zhName}, #{item.rGroup}, #{item.attributesBool})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = VALUES(id), en = VALUES(en), zh = VALUES(zh), url_name = VALUES(url_name)
mapper.select: Select id, url_name, en as enName, zh as zhName, r_group, attributes from wf_riven where attributes = 0 ORDER BY url_name
